LanguageData.Forgotty.UI.desc_Format: You can strengthen a Forgotty who has fulfilled the conditions. In return, Forgotty will lose all memories.\n\nAfter the enhancement, Forgotty will be rebooted for a while.
LanguageData.Forgotty.UI.warn_FormatSave:
This Forgotty has a backup memory installed.

It will protect the memory from formatting only once, but the backup memory will be lost.

Are you sure you want to format it?
LanguageData.Forgotty.UI.warn_Format:
If you format the Forgotty, the Forgotty will lose all memories.

Forgotty's ties to animals will be lost, and all of Forgotty's relationships with lovers and others will be erased. Except for a few, especially those who were close to Forgotty, will be emotionally affected.

Are you sure you want to format?
